Name: Mission_Duration_Requirement
Description: Mission duration requirement

Name: Mission_Duration_Goal
Description: Mission duration goal

Name: Mission_Launch_Site
Value: Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Description: Launch site

Name: Spacecraft_Operating_Temperature
Description: Operating temperature of the spacecraft

Name: Spacecraft_Orbit_Type
Description: Type of spacecraft orbit

Name: Spacecraft_Downlink_Rate
Description: Spacecraft downlink rate
Source: Julie McEnery 237th AAS meeting Town Hall talk

Name: Spacecraft_Downlink_Volume
Description: Spacecraft downlink volume

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Angle_Gap_Fill
Description: Gap fill slew angle

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Gap_Fill
Description: Gap fill slew time

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Angle_Short_FoV
Description: Shorter side of field-of-view slew angle (six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Short_FoV
Description: Shorter side of field-of-view slew time (including the settle time; six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Angle_Long_FoV
Description: Long side of field-of-view slew angle (six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Long_FoV
Description: Long side of field-of-view slew time (including the settle time; six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Angle_Microlensing_Maximum
Description: Maximum microlensing slew angle (six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Microlensing_Maximum
Description: Maximum microlensing slew time (including the settle time; six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Two_Degrees
Description: Two degree slew time (including the settle time; six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Five_Degrees
Description: Five degree slew time (including the settle time; six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Ten_Degrees
Description: Ten degree slew time (including the settle time; six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Thirty_Degrees
Description: Thirty degree slew time (including the settle time; six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Time_Ninety_Degrees
Description: Thirty degree slew time (including the settle time; six reaction wheel operation)

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Settling_Time_Small
Description: Spacecraft settling time after a slew of less than ten degrees

Name: Spacecraft_Slew_Settling_Time_Large
Description: Spacecraft settling time after a slew of more than ten degrees

Name: Telescope_Jitter
Description: Telescope jitter for high frequencies (vibration modes in the optics) per axis (rms)

Name: Telescope_Drift
Description: Telescope drift at frequencies within the Attitude Control System's bandwidth per axis (rms)

Name: Telescope_Primary_Diameter
Description: Diameter of the telescope primary mirror

Name: Telescope_Primary_Mirror_Temperature
Description: Telescope primary mirror temperature

Name: Telescope_Central_Obscuration
Description: Linear obscuration of the telescope entrance pupil (diameter ratio)

Name: Telescope_Allowed_Pitch_Range
Description: Allowed telecope pitch range towards (0 degrees) the Sun and away (180 degrees) from the Sun

Name: Telescope_Allowed_Yaw_Range
Description: Allowed telecope yaw range about the Sun line

Name: Telescope_Allowed_Roll_Range
Description: Allowed telecope roll about the line of sight (off maximum power roll angle)

Name: WFI_Correlated_Noise
Description: WFI detector correlated noise floor

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_F062
Description: Count rate per pixel in the F062 filter at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_F087
Description: Count rate per pixel in the F087 filter at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_F106
Description: Count rate per pixel in the F106 filter at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_F129
Description: Count rate per pixel in the F129 filter at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_F158
Description: Count rate per pixel in the F158 filter at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_F184
Description: Count rate per pixel in the F184 filter at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_F146
Description: Count rate per pixel in the F146 filter at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_F213
Description: Count rate per pixel in the F213 filter at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_Prism
Description: Count rate per pixel in the Prism at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Count_Rate_Zody_Minimum_Grism
Description: Count rate per pixel in the Grism at minimum zodiacal light

Name: WFI_Dark_Current
Description: WFI detector dark current per pixel (requirement)

Name: WFI_Detector_Guide_Star_Update_Rate
Description: Guide star update rate

Name: WFI_Detector_Type
Description: Detector type for WFI

Name: WFI_Detector_Quantum_Efficiency_Long
Description: WFI detector quantum efficiency (requirement; average over wavelengths between 0.8 and 2.1 microns

Name: WFI_Detector_Quantum_Efficiency_Short
Description: WFI detector quantum efficiency (requirement; average over wavelengths between 0.6 and 0.8 microns

Name: WFI_Detector_Readout_Time
Description: Sensor Chip Assembly full frame readout time

Name: WFI_Detector_Pixel_Operability
Description: WFI detector pixel operability (requirement)

Name: WFI_Detector_Total_Crosstalk
Description: WFI detector total crosstalk (requirement)

Name: WFI_Detector_Total_Noise_180s
Description: WFI detector total noise (rms uncertainty in slope fit for an exposure time of 180 sec)

Name: WFI_Detector_Inter_Pixel_Capacitance
Description: WFI detector inter-pixel capacitance (fraction of a pixel-centered total charge of 1 actually deposited in the central pixel)

Name: WFI_Detector_Full_Frame_Readout_Time
Description: WFI detector full frame readout time

Name: WFI_Field_Of_View_Effective
Description: WFI total effective field of view (ignoring gaps between detectors)

Name: WFI_Field_Of_View_Total
Description: WFI total field of view (including gaps between detectors)

Name: WFI_Focal_Ratio
Description: WFI instrument and telescope's combined focal ratio

Name: WFI_Number_Of_Active_Columns
Description: Number of active detector columns (also known as the number of pixels in the x-direction) in (the image section of) a detector

Name: WFI_Number_Of_Active_Rows
Description: Number of active detector rows (also known as the number of pixels in the y-direction) in (the image section of) a detector

Name: WFI_Jitter_Wavefront_Error
Description: Telescope intermediate focus wavefront error jitter (requirement)

Name: WFI_Image_Stability
Description: RMS wave front error (WFE) variation in 180 sec

Name: WFI_Pixel_Scale
Description: WFI detector pixel scale in arcseconds/pixel

Name: WFI_Pixel_Size
Description: WFI wide-field channel pixel size in each dimension

Name: WFI_PSF_Ellipticity
Description: WFI point spread function ellipticity per 184 seconds at WFI focus

Name: WFI_Readout_Noise
Description: WFI detector pixel readout noise rms for correlated double sampling (two successive detector readouts)

Name: WFI_Temperature
Description: WFI detector operating temperature

Name: WFI_Number
Description: Total number of scientific detectors in WFI

Name: WFI_Grism_Dispersion
Description: WFI Grism dispersion, dependent mostly on the FPA Y value in degrees (Y axis is positive towards payload origin and FPA Y axis origin is between detectors 1 and 10) as -0.1945Y + 1.0764.

Name: WFI_Grism_Wavelength_Range_G150
Description: WFI Grism wavelength range

Name: WFI_Grism_Spectral_Resolving_Power_G150
Description: WFI Grism resolving power (lambda in microns; two pixels)

Name: WFI_Prism_Wavelength_Range_P127
Description: WFI prism wavelength range

Name: WFI_Prism_Spectral_Resolving_Power_P127
Description: WFI Prism resolving power (delta lambda = two pixels)

Name: CGI_Spectroscopy_Bands23_Mean_Short_Slit_Height
Description: Bands 2-3 mean (695 nm) spectroscopy slit height for 4lambda/D wide, 6lambda/D long short" slit"

Name: CGI_Spectroscopy_Bands23_Mean_Tall_Slit_Width
Description: Bands 2-3 mean (695 nm) spectroscopy slit width for 4lambda/D wide, 10lambda/D long tall" slit"

Name: CGI_Spectroscopy_Bands23_Mean_Tall_Slit_Height
Description: Bands 2-3 mean (695 nm) spectroscopy slit height for 4lambda/D wide, 10lambda/D long tall" slit"

Name: CGI_Spectroscopy_Spectral_Resolution
Description: Spectral resolution at the centers of Band 2 (660 nm) and Band 3 (730 nm)

Name: CGI_Polarimetry_FoV
Description: Unvignetted FoV diameter without masks in each polarization angle

Name: CGI_Polarimetry_Wollaston_Prism1
Description: Polarization angles for the first Wollaston prism

Name: CGI_Polarimetry_Wollaston_Prism2
Description: Polarization angles for the second Wollaston prism

Name: CGI_Predicted_Performance_Imaging_N_Contrast_Pred
Description: Predicted planet-to-star flux ratio for an SNR=5 imaging detection in band 1 with HLC, 100hr integration, after post-processing at a separation of 4.39lambda/D (=216.94 mas). This prediction is based on modeling and error budgeting of Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope observatory and CGI, including: observatory and instrument stability during CGI con-ops, coronagraph starlight suppression performance, detector properties, and post-processing gains. Coronagraph and detector models have been validated against experimental results. Does not include model uncertainty factors on observatory or coronagraph performance (i.e., MUF=1)

Name: CGI_Predicted_Performance_Imaging_W_Contrast_Pred
Description: Predicted planet-to-star flux ratio for an SNR=5 imaging detection in band 4 with SPC, 100hr integration, after post-processing at a separation of 6lambda/D (=432.63 mas). This prediction is based on modeling and error budgeting of Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope observatory and CGI, including: observatory and instrument stability during CGI con-ops, coronagraph starlight suppression performance, detector properties, and post-processing gains. Coronagraph and detector models have been validated against experimental results. Does not include model uncertainty factors on observatory or coronagraph performance (i.e., MUF=1)

Name: CGI_Predicted_Performance_Spectroscopy_Contrast_Pred
Description: Predicted planet-to-star flux ratio for an SNR=5 spectrum in band 3 with SPC_B (bowtie), 100hr integration, after post-processing at a separation of 4.39lambda/D (=280.09 mas). This prediction is based on modeling and error budgeting of Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope observatory and CGI, including: observatory and instrument stability during CGI con-ops, coronagraph starlight suppression performance, detector properties, and post-processing gains. Coronagraph and detector models have been validated against experimental results. Does not include model uncertainty factors on observatory or coronagraph performance (i.e., MUF=1)

Name: CGI_Predicted_Performance_45offaxis_scattered_light
Description: Scattered light flux ratio per resolution element from a source 45 arcsec off axis. Applicable to all coronagraph modes

Name: CGI_Predicted_Performance_100offaxis_scattered_light
Description: Scattered light flux ratio per resolution element from a source 100 arcsec off axis. Applicable to all coronagraph modes

Name: CGI_Host_Star_Vmag_Requirement
Description: CGI host star requirement is V_AB mag<=5; CGI could potentially observe dimmer targets (V = 6-7 AB mag), but this is TBD
